Title: üë©‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶‚Äçüë¶ New Organization Feature Update
introduction:
- Create teams for your projects under one organization for easy switching. 
 - Invite teammates to specific teams for better access control.

Improved.description: You can now save messages in the Playground.
You can import prompts from Prompts page into the Playground.
You can now select code in the 'View Code' window.
Added tooltips for a better user experience.

Fixed.description: Fixed an issue where 'tool_choice' did not appear in 'View Code'.
Fixed an issue where Reset button didn't work in the Playground.
Fixed an issue LLM requests couldn't be run in the lab.
